name: Activate
description: An ability that can be used once, after the first turn.

name: Deactivate
description: Re-enable use of the active ability.

name: Reactivate
description: Retrigger the active ability immediately.

name: Haste
description: The card can be activated on the turn it is played.

name: Summon
description: Move a card to the battlefield without playing it.

name: Expend X
description: Triggers if X land dice are rerolled.

name: Spawn
description: Turn a number of land dice to the indicated faces.

name: Reroll X
description: Reroll X common or allied land dice.

name: Rally X
description: Add X points to your score.

name: Rout X
description: Subtract X points from your score.

name: Score
description: The running total of points gained from Rally or lost from Rout.

name: Protect
description: Prevent a unit from being targeted by hostile abilities.

name: Vulnerable
description: The card cannot receive protection.

name: Displace
description: Move an opponent's card, normally away from protection.

name: Destroy
description: Move a card to the graveyard.

name: Banish
description: Remove a card from the game.

name: Assault X
description: Destroy an enemy unit of X or less power.

name: Assassinate X
description: Assault X, bypassing Protection.

name: Seize X
description: Move an enemy unit of X or less power to your battlefield.

name: Armor
description: Increases resistance to Assault, Assassinate, or Seize abilities.

name: Piercing
description: This card's attack ignores armor.

name: Overkill X
description: Triggers if an assault or assassination exceeds the target's power by at least X.

name: Disloyal
description: The card is played to your opponent's battlefield.

name: Chaos X
description: Triggers if there are at least X unique land types.

name: Armor Up
description: Triggers when an armor card is equipped to the unit.

name: Bonded
description: Triggers if you control more than one copy of this card.

name: Echo
description: Move this card to the top of your deck between rounds, once per game.

name: Purify
description: Remove all statuses from a unit.

name: Lock
description: Status that disables all of a card's abilities.

name: Poison
description: A unit is destroyed if it receives two instances of this status.

name: Contract
description: Status that causes the opponent to rally 3 when this unit is destroyed or banished.

name: Stalwart
description: Status that allows the unit to remain on the battlefield after the round ends.

name: Immune
description: Status that prevents the unit from receiving additional statuses.

name: Invisible
description: Status that prevents the unit from being targeted by hostile abilities.
